description: Robust stochastic policy for Experiment 2b (Bank B), iteration 4. Posts full collateral at the start of the day and always releases payments immediately. Bank B acts as a systematic liquidity provider to break gridlock and maximize the probability that all transactions settle by EOD across stochastic scenarios.

strategic_collateral_tree.description: At the start of the day, post the full collateral capacity to maximize liquidity available for settlement and support high-throughput behavior.

payment_tree.description: RTGS-style rule: always release payments immediately when they are evaluated. This maximizes throughput and acts as a liquidity-providing strategy to help break potential gridlock states and minimize EOD unsettled transactions across stochastic seeds.
